## Public Member Functions

### determineCalleeSaves() {#aaabcdae312538836cccf2ed4e8069999}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void XCoreFrameLowering::determineCalleeSaves (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a> &amp; SavedRegs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regscavenger">RegScavenger</a> &#42; RS=nullptr) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This method determines which of the registers reported by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo/#ad71b5bc0aa81f5dec06cbfecaf2f7183">TargetRegisterInfo::getCalleeSavedRegs()</a> should actually get saved.

The default implementation checks populates the <code>SavedRegs</code> bitset with all registers which are modified in the function, targets may override this function to save additional registers. This method also sets up the register scavenger ensuring there is a free register or a frameindex available. This method should not be called by any passes outside of PEI, because it may change state passed in by <code>MF</code> and <code>RS</code>. The preferred interface outside PEI is getCalleeSaves.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/xcoreframelowering-h/#l00049">49</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/xcoreframelowering-h">XCoreFrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/xcoreframelowering-cpp/#l00526">526</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/xcoreframelowering-cpp">XCoreFrameLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### eliminateCallFramePseudoInstr() {#a0ab2cc201e1521acab599966d10b815d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MachineBasicBlock::iterator XCoreFrameLowering::eliminateCallFramePseudoInstr (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> MI) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This method is called during prolog/epilog code insertion to eliminate call frame setup and destroy pseudo instructions (but only if the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/target">Target</a> is using them).

It is responsible for eliminating these instructions, replacing them with concrete instructions. This method need only be implemented if using call frame setup/destroy pseudo instructions. Returns an iterator pointing to the instruction after the replaced one.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/xcoreframelowering-h/#l00046">46</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/xcoreframelowering-h">XCoreFrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/xcoreframelowering-cpp/#l00479">479</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/xcoreframelowering-cpp">XCoreFrameLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### processFunctionBeforeFrameFinalized() {#ad1c7f63bd41f376ebc594e3f8440d1ad}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void XCoreFrameLowering::processFunctionBeforeFrameFinalized (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regscavenger">RegScavenger</a> &#42; RS=nullptr) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
processFunctionBeforeFrameFinalized - This method is called immediately before the specified function&#39;s frame layout (MF.getFrameInfo()) is finalized.

Once the frame is finalized, MO&#95;FrameIndex operands are replaced with direct constants. This method is optional.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/xcoreframelowering-h/#l00052">52</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/xcoreframelowering-h">XCoreFrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/xcoreframelowering-cpp/#l00565">565</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/xcoreframelowering-cpp">XCoreFrameLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### restoreCalleeSavedRegisters() {#a88fe1478dc92f6e9310051316749f031}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool XCoreFrameLowering::restoreCalleeSavedRegisters (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> MI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref">MutableArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/calleesavedinfo">CalleeSavedInfo</a> &gt; CSI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo">TargetRegisterInfo</a> &#42; TRI) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
restoreCalleeSavedRegisters - Issues instruction(s) to restore all callee saved registers and returns true if it isn&#39;t possible / profitable to do so by issuing a series of load instructions via loadRegToStackSlot().

If it returns true, and any of the registers in CSI is not restored, it sets the corresponding Restored flag in CSI to false. Returns false otherwise.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/xcoreframelowering-h/#l00040">40</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/xcoreframelowering-h">XCoreFrameLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/xcoreframelowering-cpp/#l00446">446</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/xcoreframelowering-cpp">XCoreFrameLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### spillCalleeSavedRegisters() {#acc16e0a256c156ca27db8e17d37cceab}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool XCoreFrameLowering::spillCalleeSavedRegisters (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> MI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/calleesavedinfo">CalleeSavedInfo</a> &gt; CSI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo">TargetRegisterInfo</a> &#42; TRI) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
spillCalleeSavedRegisters - Issues instruction(s) to spill all callee saved registers and returns true if it isn&#39;t possible / profitable to do so by issuing a series of store instructions via storeRegToStackSlot().

Returns false otherwise.
